tokens.resolved_gloss: to glow or grow warm; figuratively (usually) to blaze up, of anger, zeal, jealousy
tokens.translation: to glow or grow warm; figuratively (usually) to blaze up, of anger, zeal, jealousy

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
tokens.translation: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: narrow; (as a noun) a tight place (usually figuratively, i.e. trouble); also a pebble (as in 6864); (transitive) an opponent (as crowding)
tokens.translation: narrow; (as a noun) a tight place (usually figuratively, i.e. trouble); also a pebble (as in 6864); (transitive) an opponent (as crowding)
